resources.string: We need your location to enable Geofencing. Only when Geolocation is enabled, we can log your time. Geofencing is used to verify that you\'re on Site.

Please enter your phone number. Remember that you must be already authorised by your employer to use this application. Do not include country code while entering your phone number - Example : 022345678
Hey there, just make sure that these details are correct. For user authentication, a SMS with the verification code will be sent to your registered phone number, when you press the button.
